thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.ca
thread.title: Mubashira Nusrat Farooqi
thread.title_full: Optimalprint reviewed by Mubashira Nusrat Farooqi

author: Mubashira Nusrat Farooqi
title: Mubashira Nusrat Farooqi
text:
I am extremely satisfied with Optimalprint! The simplistic designs are wonderful and elegant.
I ordered about 150 invitations for my wedding, and they arrived exactly two days later! The quality is amazing, and the layout is exactly how I designed it.
The only improvement could be in the designing interface, it was difficult to centre the various text fields, and there was no way to zoom in either.
Besides that, I am so glad I went with this website, and got a great discount too. Will definitely be using Optimalprint again :)
